refnamediv.refpurpose: A rank 2 tensor with cubic symmetry

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: A CubicRank2Tensor is a symmetric second rank tensor with cubic rotational symmetry. The argument xx is a real number. The structure is shown in .

note.para: The CubicRank2Tensor is identical to the IsotropicRank2Tensor. Since people are accustomed to specifying isotropic properties in terms of scalars, instead of tensors, &oof2; doesn't actually provide an IsotropicRank2Tensor class. The CubicRank2Tensor is provided simply so that the user interface can present the same symmetries for rank 2 properties as for rank 4 properties.
